text:
The oembed field doesn’t seem to be working for facebook videos. For example, `<https://www.facebook.com/facebook/videos/10153231379946729/>` as a embed video url gives the following error message:
> You can’t embed this media URL for sharing.
Anyone else have any luck with fb vids?
Hello. I’m quite new to HubSpot and I’ve been trying for hours to get data from a foreignid column in a HubDB row field. Is this possible, please?
try pretty printing the row with the `|pprint` filter
you’ll see the data available to you
